title: LF Twisted treeline ranked friends ♥
body:
Hey guys, 

I'm looking for two friends to play twisted treeline with me! Both normal and ranked, but primarily on the ranked days as my goal is to get to gold. I'm currently TT bronze 2, and my 5s flex rank is gold 5 and solo queue is gold 1. Would prefer someone who is like myself, with a low TT rank but an average soloq rank. 

Being a support 1-trick, i'm not super great with the champs the TT meta requires so i'm still getting a feel for what works for me :)

If you're interested, please leave a comment below. My friends list is only 3 spots off full, so I won't be accepting anyone through client. 

Thanks for your time ♥

replies.body:
Hey im keen. Pretty sure im currently silver 4 ranked in TT. I play mostly between 16:00-19:00 aest (qld).

Chuck me an add if you like.
